job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Computer Software,Human Resources,Information Technology and Services
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtdo what you love love what you do ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt at workday we help the worlds largest organizations adapt to whats next by bringing finance hr and planning into a single enterprise cloud we work hard and were serious about what we do but we like to have fun too we put people first celebrate diversity drive innovation and do good in the communities where we live and work ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtabout the teamltbrgtltstronggtdo you dig data scads and scads of data we guess you probably do since youre looking at a machine learning job ad payroll data super dry stuff huh well truth is only a subset of the population uses online shopping or orders food deliveries or binges tv series but everyone everyone who gets paid has payroll data more of it every month every day every hour payroll has more or less done the same thing since it was the first ever automated business application built in the s but we believe that using modern machine learning techniques we can transform the way that payroll is processed so if you like working with huge volumes of vital data and you are interested in a goal of making peoples lives better by ensuring they get paid correctly accurately swiftly for the work they do wed love to talk to youltbrgtltstronggtabout the roleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt as an ml engineer you will help develop datadriven automated comprehensive solutions using modern software and data engineering stacks to enable training deployment and lifecycle management of a variety of ml models supervised and unsupervised deep learning and classical etc you will work closely with product managers software engineers to deliver ml solutions that provide payroll administrators and users enormous value and efficiency your work will also ensure that users have the best payroll processing experience by providing predictive analytics and recommendations ltbrgtltbrgt you will use workdays ml development environment and resources on rich hr and payroll datasets to deliver value that transforms the way our customers use payroll products you will apply your highly technical problem solving creative thinking beautiful mind using the latest ml techniques and toolsets and make a huge impact on the worlds largest enterprises that use workday to process payroll for millions of employees ltbrgtltstronggt ltstronggtin this role you wouldltstronggt ltstronggtltulgtltligt be part of a team of data scientists and software developers ltligtltligt learn all about hr and payroll data and processes ltligtltligt own data exploration and transformation feature engineering design and enhance ml modelsframeworks that deliver anomaly detection prediction and recommendation solutions for payroll application ltligtltligt develop maintain and enhance ml solutions that are highly usable scalable and secure ltligtltligt grow your career in a great place to work and a forwardlooking company ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtabout youltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt bs or ms in relevant fields computer science mathematics engineering phd preferred ltligtltligt yrs experience as part of a data science machine learning software development team or relevant work in a phd program ltligtltligt proficiency in python and supporting numeric libraries ltligtltligt experience in machine learning frameworks ampamp toolkits such as tensorflow pytorch sklearn ltligtltligt handson experience with statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms especially for supervised and unsupervised methods ltligtltligt experienced in handling largescale complex data sets data modeling and productizing machine learning algorithms ltligtltligt strong experience building applied machine learning products including taking a product through design implementation and to production is a plus ltligtltligt self motivated with a strong sense of ownership urgency and resiliency ltligtltligt strong communication and interpersonal skills ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgt workday is an equal opportunity employer including individuals with disabilities and protected veterans
